CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 30, 1961, pg. 2, reads: "It's Christmas Time - Cafe society's sophisticates have nothing on these two pint-sized "babes" who have really gotten into the swing of things with their own version of the twist...The occasion was a Christmas party for Robbin, given by her grandmother, at 2801 Bedford Ave. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of boys, and girls, including Robin Bullard wearing striped top and holding guitar, posed in front of aluminum Christmas tree, for Christmas party in home of Margaret Bullard, 2801 Bedford Avenue
